issue.title: [C++] Deprecate ArrayBuilder::Advance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14230](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14230). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ArrayBuilder::Advance` was never properly tested or exercised, and it turns out it's incorrect for some types (ARROW-14065). On the mailing-list, it was decided to deprecate it:

https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/r304b1266632c641a1d940aeb18426f1c069335feddb5f562513cde34%40%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E
